title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: NoneGeneral theory of nonlinear optics, characterization of nonlinear medium, connection with electro-optic coefficients, optics of crystal, principal axes, dispersive medium, second order process, Manley-Rowe relations, parametric oscillations, second harmonic generation, Kerr effect third order process, magneto-optics, quarter wave and half wave plates, nonlinear phenomena in guided wave, solitons, effect of chirping in soliton propagation in fibre, nonlinear effects in semiconductors, lasers, optical bistability, devices based on nonlinear property.
